mobs.LongDesc: A kind old man named Tam al'Thor.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Father of Rand, Tam is known mainly in Emond's Field for the brandy and cider
he takes every year to   Bel Tine.  He is a strong, kind man.  It is known
that his wife was an outlander and that he traveled widely early in his life.

mobs.LongDesc: A vicious wolf stares hungrily at you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see your average every day hungry wolf. Better hide your sheep.  His fur
is long and black.

mobs.LongDesc: A Coplin is here trying to annoy you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Known for being troublemakers and complainers the Congars and Coplins are a
general nuisance in the Two river's area.  He looks untrustworthy.

mobs.LongDesc: A hyperactive kid is bouncing around here, saying something.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Just like his daddy, this kid takes after his parents.  You wouldn't give
this munchkin the time of day.  He mumbles something about a ghost dog that
can breathe fire.

mobs.LongDesc: A black wolf with silver streaks stares at you hungrily.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a large hungry wolf. She looks back at you with murder in her eyes.
Her fur is black with streaks of silver.

mobs.LongDesc: A little girl is here trying to find the one she loves.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This little nymph is bound to create the next Coplin kid sometime in her
lifetime.  Her affection for the Coplin child is self-evident.

mobs.LongDesc: Mavra Mallen the wisdom who is subbing for Nynaeve.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A wise woman, she is really just a step down from Aes Sadai. She uses her
magic to predict the way of the seasons, and heal the wounded and dying. From
the look of her you can tell this is not her normal village. She says to you,
"I'm subbing for Nynaeve while she chases Rand and the Children across the
world."  She looks like she might have something to sell you.

mobs.LongDesc: The corpse of a Trolloc is lying here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Horribly disfigured, Trollocs embody the corruption of the dark lord in their
form. While normally dumb, this Trolloc is intelligent. He lays here waiting
to capture you for the dark one.

mobs.LongDesc: Daisy waves a rolling pin at you and says get out of my kitchen!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Known for being troublemakers and complainers, the Congars and Coplins are a
general nuisance in the Two river's area. Daisy is looking for her husband,
because he wants to interfere with the Woman's Council.  She looks fairly
strong.

mobs.LongDesc: Wit Congar is here trying to get Mavra thrown out.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Known for being troublemakers and complainers, the Congars and Coplins are a
general nuisance in the Two River's area. This Congar wants the new Wisdom
ousted. He practically runs you over as he heads toward the Woman's Council
to achieve his goal.  He looks weak and has puny muscles.

mobs.LongDesc: A black raven is perched nearby, spying for the Dark One.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a black bird with glowing red eyes.  It is said that the dark one
uses these birds as spies for his troops.  It looks weak.

mobs.LongDesc: Marin al'vere works here, filling the Inn with a delightful smell.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A jolly expression is on the face of this woman.   She is as well known for
her delightful honey cakes, and fabulous cooking as Bran is known for being
mayor. She gives off an aura of kindness you have not seen matched in a long
time.

mobs.LongDesc: Mayor Bran al'vere is here managing the affairs of Emond's Field.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a kindly man of middle years. By the way he holds himself, and the
kindly looks of those around him you can tell he is a friend to all in the
Two Rivers. He owns the Winespring Inn, and is mayor of the town of Emond's
Field.  He looks like he has quite a bit of fight left in him, despite his
age.

mobs.LongDesc: A faithful horse stands here, eating from a feedbag.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a faithful horse standing here. It looks like it has traveled a
extremely long distance.  You see the mark of Tar Valon branded on its side.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge Trolloc with red fur is about to attack you.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Horribly disfigured, Trollocs embody the corruption of the dark lord in their
form.  This Trolloc is particularly ugly.  Its half-human head has the muzzle
of a wolf, and its scalp is adorned with horns like an adult ram. The legs of
the beast are well muscled, yet somehow terribly wrong. Huge hands and arms
like those of a werewolf complete the abomination.  The trolloc has thick red
fur to protect it from the elements. It towers over you.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge stoney looking Trolloc is ready to eat you for lunch!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Horribly disfigured, Trollocs embody the corruption of the dark lord in their
form. This Trolloc is terribly ugly and disfigured. Its grotesque half-human
head looks like it was ripped from an adult bull.  The legs of the beast are
well muscled, and end in dangerous looking hooves. Huge four fingered hands
complete the abomination, attached to puny looking arms. A bug like
exo-skeleton helps protect this Trolloc from physical harm. It towers over
you.

mobs.LongDesc: Cloaked in midnight, a black rider hides in the shadows.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Like a shadow in a graveyard, a tall man sits atop a horse of the darkest
hue. His face is almost impossible to make out, and if you didn't know better
you'd swear he didn't have one. An aura of pure hatred flows from him like
water from a river. Could he be a Myrddaal? You feel sick just looking at
him.  He looks extremely tough.

mobs.LongDesc:
Greedy old Hightower stands here pushing around the haulers, and taking your
money.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a man with a narrow face, and pointed features. Prone to fits of
rage, and extremely greedy Hightower's only job in life has been to run the
Ferry across the Taren.

mobs.LongDesc: A well muscled Hauler stands here, running the ferry.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The hauler looks well muscled from years of doing the manual labor required
for pulling the ferry across the Taren.

mobs.LongDesc:
Moiraine Damodred cackles with an aura of power as she concentrates on a
angreal.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Her face has a kind of agelessness to it, which all Aes Sedai seem to have.
She has large dark eyes and hair hanging in dark ringlets. She is short and
slender, about 5'2".  She looks extremely powerful.

mobs.LongDesc: A Watchman of Baerlon is here, guarding the South Gate.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Set to guard the south gate, this watchman is a seasoned warrior.  He looks
like he is ready to jump in at the first sign of trouble.

mobs.LongDesc: A judge is standing here, reading a case.
A demonic cavewight is coiled here, ready to attack.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
With long scrawny limbs, hands as huge as shovels, a thin, hunched torso
and a head like a battering ram, these creature almost looks comical.  As it
crouches, it's knees come up to the level of it's ears.  But as it senses
you, it unfolds itself, like a spider awakening from a long sleep, and what
you once thought comical now looks completely different, in fact... Deadly!

mobs.LongDesc: al'Lan Mandragoran is here, practicing his sword forms.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
al'Lan is about nine feet tall with tufted pointed ears, long shaggy black
hair,and a goat-like nose almost as broad as his face.  His thick eyebrows
hang almost to his cheeks,with pale eyes glowing as big as teacups. Broad
blunt fingers work death from hands as big as hams to those who would harm
Moiraine.  His wide mouth with white teeth broad as chisels casts curses at
offenders. He is Moiraine's Warder and has a link with her granting him
special powers.  He will defend her at any cost.

mobs.LongDesc: A White Cloak Questioner is here, holding his own version of the Inquisition.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This Child of Light is a Questioner, which have been known and feared as the
torturers of the order.  They are known for their brutality and their hidden
manipulations.  Even the other White Cloaks fear the questioners.

mobs.ShortDesc: a officer of the Children of Light
mobs.LongDesc: A officer of the Children of Light is here giving orders.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
As an officer of the Children of Light he works closely with the lord
captain.  In his leisure he  enjoys hunting, fishing, and the occasional
torture of a darkfriend. His turn-ons are: no wait a sec

mobs.LongDesc: A dumb White Cloak stands here saying, "Walk in the light."
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This dim-witted one is an obviously less intelligent member of the Children
of the Light.  "Walk in the Light," he commands as you walk near this odd
one.  The brain cells of this "badly lit" one apparently blew out long ago.
He can barely hold his sword.

mobs.LongDesc: A Darkfriend is here, pretending to be a White Cloak.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
At first glance this guy appears to be your average, every day Child of the
Light.  When you look at him closely you see his true nature, while crusading
for the children, he is really a spy for the Dark One.

mobs.LongDesc: A trolloc is here, and he looks like he's about to run for the hills.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Terrified Trolloc Horribly disfigured, Trollocs embody the corruption of the
dark lord in their form.  Pushed hard by the Fades this Trolloc has been
forced into Shadar Logoth against his will.  Terror and fear is evident in
his completely disfigured face.  He looks like at any moment he may run
screaming from the room.

mobs.LongDesc: A ordinary looking Human is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This person looks much like any other person.  For some reason you feel like
you cant trust this person.

mobs.LongDesc: Elmindreda leans against a doorframe, having a vision.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She is a slender, 5'3 woman with black hair cut short and appears to be about
24. She has dark brown eyes, good-size breasts, long lashes.  She is somewhat
of an "in-the-closet" Aes Sadai. She says, "I see visions of the future."

mobs.LongDesc: Bornhald, Lord Captin of the White Cloaks stands here in a muddy cloak.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an average looking man that seems to be full of him self. He says,
"The sins of the mother are visited to the; fifth generation, and the sins of
the father to the tenth" to you as you get near. The knot beneath the
sunburst on his cloak tells you he is a Lord Captain of the White Cloaks.

mobs.LongDesc: Rand al'Thor stands here, contemplating his role in this world.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Rand is a tall, strong, handsome young man with broad shoulders, dark reddish
hair, bluish-gray eyes, and a sun-darkened face. He is approximately 17 years
old and about 6'6". He is right-minded and always tries to do his best. He
was a simple shepherd before Moiraine came to take him away.  He is thinking
of Ba'alzamon.

mobs.LongDesc: Perrin Aybara's eyes gleam through the fog.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Looks to be about Half-head shorter than Rand, with long shaggy curly hair,
stocky, thick arms and shoulders, thick slabs of muscles at his sides, and
yellow eyes. A young blacksmiths apprentice, Perrin is a friend and companion
of Rand. His eyes glow with a strange light that is neither good nor evil.
He looks back at you suspiciously and clutches his deadly looking axe
tighter.

mobs.LongDesc: Mathrim Cauthon is pondering his place in the world.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Mat is a trickster at heart. He is always joking around, playing jokes on
people and getting in trouble. He cries wolf often, so people do not always
believe him when he says something. Originally he was a farmer in Emonds
Field.  He is wiry, long-limbed, well-muscled and rumpled-looking with deep
brown eyes about 511".

mobs.LongDesc: An evil looking shadow gets ready to place a knife in your back.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Maybe your mind is playing tricks on you, but you think you see a shadow over
there that isnt yours.  It looks big and foreboding. Maybe Shadar Logoth is
just playing tricks on you.

mobs.LongDesc: The heart of Mashadar is all around you, and it looks like it's hungry.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a massive cloud of pure evil.  The sheer presence of him makes you
want to run in fear. It is said that it would take the combined magic of the
entire white tower just to harm him.  You don't think your weapon could even
harm him at all.

mobs.LongDesc: Mordeth is here, asking you to help carry away the treasure.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a sleek, somewhat overfed man with drooping eyelids that make him
look like hes hiding something. He is bald, and walks like he is a person of
nobility. He seems strange.  Something tells you he isnt what he appears to
be.

mobs.LongDesc: A Fade sets your nerves on edge.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Twisted off-spring of the Trollocs, Fades are throw backs to the original
humans in the Trolloc gene pool.  Unlike their trolloc brothers, they are
much more powerful.  Their soul is closely entwined with the dark one
granting them special powers.  Their gaze inspires all but the heartiest of
people to run in sheer terror.  The only ones not affected by this power are
the Trollocs, which they command. They have black voids where their eyes
should be.

mobs.LongDesc: The curse of shadar logoth is here, making the dead come back to life.
A friendly wolf is here, defending against the Trollocs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Bloody and battered, this wolf fights on against evil even though it is
hopelessly out matched by the hordes of Trollocs.

mobs.LongDesc: A friendly looking wolf is here, defending Perrin.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The wolf looks like it will defend Perrin no matter what the cost.

mobs.LongDesc: A Watchman of Baerlon is here, guarding the East Gate.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Set to guard the east gate, this watchman is a seasoned warrior.  He looks
like he is ready to jump at the first sign of trouble.

mobs.LongDesc: A smart White Cloak stands here saying, "Walk in the light."
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Unlike his dumber companions, this White Cloak has had alot less brain
washing.   Now and then he grips his sword and looks at you with reproach.

mobs.LongDesc: A plump cook looks happy doing her job.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Its alot of work cooking for a entire inn, especially one the size of the
Stag and Lion, but this woman does it with great skill.  Second only to Marin
at the Winespring Inn, this woman is a friend to friend to anyone that is
hungry.

mobs.LongDesc: A chambermaid is here, cleaning the rooms.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Underpaid, and overworked, this maid none the less does her job with a smile.
You cannot help but wonder what makes her so happy.

mobs.LongDesc: A ant has been mutated by the vile secretions of the trollocs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Somehow, some ants have survived the foul soil of the Trolloc's latrine.
They have become mutated, and diseased.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge Trolloc drinks from the vile well with glee.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Horribly disfigured, Trollocs embody the corruption of the dark lord in their
form.  This Trolloc is particularly ugly.  Its half-human head has the muzzle
of a wolf, and its scalp is adorned with horns like an adult ram. The legs of
the beast are well muscled, yet somehow terribly wrong. A strange silk like
web of ice coats the Trolloc providing some protection to it.

mobs.LongDesc: A Fade is communicating with the Dark One.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Twisted off-spring of the Trollocs, Fades are throw backs to the original
humans in the Trolloc gene pool.  Unlike their trolloc brothers, they are
much more powerful.  Their soul is closely entwined with the dark one
granting them special powers.  Their gaze inspires all but the heartiest of
people to run in sheer terror.  The only ones not affected by this power are
the Trollocs, which they command. They have black voids where their eyes
should be.

mobs.LongDesc: A Fade is using evil magic here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Twisted off-spring of the Trollocs, Fades are throw backs to the original
humans in the Trolloc gene pool.  Unlike their trolloc brothers, they are
much more powerful.  Their soul is closely entwined with the dark one
granting them special powers.  Their gaze inspires all but the heartiest of
people to run in sheer terror.  The only ones not affected by this power are
the Trollocs, which they command. They have black voids where their eyes
should be.

mobs.LongDesc: A dustbunny is here, hiding from the chambermaid.
mobs.DetailedDesc: Awww... he looks so cute.

mobs.LongDesc: A determined Fade is here, pushing the Trollocs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Twisted off-spring of the Trollocs, Fades are throw backs to the original
humans in the Trolloc gene pool.  Unlike their trolloc brothers, they are
much more powerful.  Their soul is closely entwined with the dark one
granting them special powers.  Their gaze inspires all but the heartiest of
people to run in sheer terror.  The only ones not affected by this power are
the Trollocs, which they command. They have black voids where their eyes
should be.

mobs.LongDesc: A tendril of Mashadar floats near you, offering a quick death.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
It is said that if you touch a tendril of Mashadar you will die almost
instantly.  Because of Mashadar's enormus size, it never truely exists in one
place.  The best you can ever hope to do is kill the heart of Mashadar. The
tendril is utterly mindless, but if attacked it will quickly try to consume
you.

mobs.LongDesc: A huge, well armored Trolloc is being pushed by a group of Fades.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Horribly disfigured, Trollocs embody the corruption of the dark lord in their
form.  This Trolloc is particularly ugly.  Its half-human head has the muzzle
of a wolf, and its scalp is adorned with horns like an adult ram. The legs of
the beast are well muscled, yet somehow terribly wrong. A light coating of
brimestone coats the Trolloc, providing him partial resistance to almost
everything.  It towers over you.

mobs.LongDesc: A determined Fade is here, pushing the Trollocs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Twisted off-spring of the Trollocs, Fades are throw backs to the original
humans in the Trolloc gene pool.  Unlike their trolloc brothers, they are
much more powerful.  Their soul is closely entwined with the dark one
granting them special powers.  Their gaze inspires all but the heartiest of
people to run in sheer terror.  The only ones not affected by this power are
the Trollocs, which they command. They have black voids where their eyes
should be.

mobs.LongDesc: A bony rabbit leaps through the underbrush.
A tree is burning here, obviously someone didn't help prevent forest fires.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Egwene's camp fire has set this huge tree on fire.  Something needs to be
done about this tree or the whole forest will catch fire.

mobs.LongDesc: A fish is swiming in the icy water.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
It looks just like your average, everyday fish exept that its evil and has
nasty looking fangs.

mobs.LongDesc: A sheep is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: The sheep looks like a sheep.

mobs.LongDesc: Ba'alzamon the lord of darkness stands here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The sorcerer, antithesis of the Creator, Baalzamon is the god of all evil.
Here in his spectral form, he torments your dreams, and tries to bend you to
his will.  His goal: Making YOU a servant of darkness! Although his body is
trapped in Shayol Ghul, the essence of his power can affect you even in this
form.  This lord of the grave looks almost unstoppable, as he offers you his
golden chalice of blood.

mobs.LongDesc: A Fade is communicating with the Dark One.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Twisted off-spring of the Trollocs, Fades are throw backs to the original
humans in the Trolloc gene pool.  Unlike their trolloc brothers, they are
much more powerful.  Their soul is closely entwined with the dark one
granting them special powers.  Their gaze inspires all but the heartiest of
people to run in sheer terror.  The only ones not affected by this power are
the Trollocs, which they command. They have black voids where their eyes
should be.

mobs.LongDesc: A Fade is communicating with the Dark One.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Twisted off-spring of the Trollocs, Fades are throw backs to the original
humans in the Trolloc gene pool.  Unlike their trolloc brothers, they are
much more powerful.  Their soul is closely entwined with the dark one
granting them special powers.  Their gaze inspires all but the heartiest of
people to run in sheer terror.  The only ones not affected by this power are
the Trollocs, which they command. They have black voids where their eyes
should be.

mobs.LongDesc: A Fade is communicating with the Dark One.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Twisted off-spring of the Trollocs, Fades are throw backs to the original
humans in the Trolloc gene pool.  Unlike their trolloc brothers, they are
much more powerful.  Their soul is closely entwined with the dark one
granting them special powers.  Their gaze inspires all but the heartiest of
people to run in sheer terror.  The only ones not affected by this power are
the Trollocs, which they command. They have black voids where their eyes
should be.

mobs.LongDesc: Rand al'Thor stands here, contemplating his role in this world.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Rand is a tall, strong, handsome young man with broad shoulders, dark reddish
hair, bluish-gray eyes, and a sun-darkened face. He is approximately 17 years
old and about 6'6". He is right-minded and always tries to do his best. He
was a simple shepherd before Moiraine came to take him away.  He is thinking
of Ba'alzamon.
